desc: Slight HP recovery to 1 ally.
Slight fixed MP recovery to 1 ally.
Large fixed MP recovery to 1 ally.
Full HP recovery to 1 ally.
Full HP recovery to all allies.
Full HP and MP recovery to 1 ally.
Revives 1 ally with half HP.
Revives 1 ally with full HP.
Cures status ailments on 1 ally.
Cures status ailments on all allies.
Slight fixed HP recovery to 1 ally.
Moderate fixed HP recovery to 1 ally.
Large fixed HP recovery to 1 ally.
Recovers beyond MAX HP to 1 ally but has a chance to inflict Charm/Confusion/Mirage.
Slight HP recovery to all allies.
Moderate HP and MP recovery to 1 ally.
Chance of inflicting Poison to all foes.
Chance of inflicting Sleep to all foes.
Chance of inflicting Confusion to all foes.
Chance of inflicting Mirage to all foes.
Chance of inflicting Seal to all foes.
Greatly increases the damage of the next Strength-based attack for self.
Greatly increases the damage of the next Magic-based attack for self.
Displays info for 1 foe.
Return to the last visited leyline found. Item is not consumed upon use.
Slight HP recovery to 1 ally during battle. Item is not consumed upon use.
Very slight MP recovery to 1 ally during battle. Item is not consumed upon use.
Cures ailments on 1 ally. Item is not consumed upon use.
Revives 1 ally during battle. Item is not consumed upon use.
Displays info for 1 foe. Item is not consumed upon use.
Very slight HP recovery to all allies during battle. Item is not consumed upon use.
Weak Almighty attack to all foes. Item is not consumed upon use.
Grants 10 glory.
Grants 100 glory.

Allows the Nahobino to reallocate his stat points.
